attributes.action: Keep the 15 point deduction im posed on Leeds United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds deserve the deduction becuase they broke the rules and for that they were punished and now they are just acting like spoiled brats becuase they know theyll never make the play-offs without the 15 points

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
